ygData.subject: Re: General EQ question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... believe that the spawn is longer than 7 hours.   This might be wrong , but I was told that it used to be every 7 hours but now they have changed it to 2
ygData.messageBody:
>it is +10 wisdom, +10 mana. I got mine last week. Unfortunately, I
believe that the spawn is longer than 7 hours. This might be wrong , but
I was told that it used to be every 7 hours but now they have changed it to
2 spawns per day. I waited a FULL 7 hours when I camped him, so if it is
in fact 7 hours then I must have got there RIGHT after he died, and the
place was empty when I got there so I believe it is longer than 7 hours.
I hate the camping quests... I guess that is Verant's idea of a good time.
I literally sat at his spawn site for 7 hours. He is level 15 or so...
green to me at 27. It is a nice item though...

In part of their quest against camping, EQ set things up with a spawn
range. Not a specific time. the 7 hour spawn will have a time of, say, 5 to
7 hours in which it will respawn. As far as I know, the longest spawn in
the game is something on the Shaman armour quest, with a maximum of 48
hours between death and respawn.

Lareneg. Cleric of Brell, Tribunal server,
